attributes.action: Stop Microsoft using ai in party chats and profanity breach for age of 18+
attributes.background: Microsoft article forcing ai so listening to party chats in private without consent we don't feel as though this is a fair usage of our private chats and wish to enjoy our time as we as people should the snowflakes should just leave a chat and enjoy their day if they don't like it

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
